content: If checked, all new users will receive a invite letter with authorization details.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip explaining that an invite letter will be sent to new users who have this option checked. It appears in a Help Button within the Import Complete Step page, providing context for users interacting with this feature.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تفاصيل التفويض' for 'authorization details' is not the most natural or accurate. 'تفويض' literally means 'authorization' itself. A more common and understandable phrasing would be 'تفاصيل صلاحية' or 'بيانات التفويض'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إذا تم التحقق منها، فسيتلقى جميع المستخدمين الجدد خطاب دعوة مع تفاصيل صلاحية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb tense in the Azerbaijani translation is a bit awkward. 'alacaqlar' (will receive) sounds slightly unnatural in this context. It might be better to use a more general present tense to imply a recurring action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İşarələndikdə bütün yeni istifadəçilər avtorizasiya təfərrüatları olan dəvət məktubu alır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, it's beneficial to consider capitalization. In Azerbaijani, titles and the start of sentences are capitalized. Using capitalization would improve the overall readability and feel more professional.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İşarələndikdə bütün yeni istifadəçilər avtorizasiya təfərrüatları olan dəvət məktubu alır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'authorization details' is not the most natural translation of 'authorization details' in this context. While technically correct, a more user-friendly translation would be 'инструкции за достъп' (access instructions) or 'детайли за активиране' (activation details).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако е отметнато, всички нови потребители ще получат писмо с покана с детайли за активиране.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "authorization details" is not accurately translated. "Թույլտվության մանրամասներով" is a literal translation and might not convey the intended meaning of invite letter authorization details. A more appropriate translation might focus on access details or permission details within the invitation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating "authorization details" as something like "մուտքի իրավունքի մանրամասներով" (access details) or "բացառիկ իրավունքի մանրամասներով" (exclusive rights/permissions details).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '인증 정보가 포함된 초대장' (invitation containing authentication information) is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. '인증 정보' is technically correct, but a more user-friendly phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 체크하면 모든 신규 사용자에게 인증 관련 정보가 담긴 초대장이 발송됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrasing '전송됩니다' (jeonseongdoemnida) is somewhat formal. A more conversational tone might be better suited for a tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 체크하면 모든 신규 사용자에게 인증 관련 정보가 담긴 초대장이 발송됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ຖ້າກວດແລ້ວ" translates to 'If checked' which is acceptable but could be improved to be more natural. 'ຖ້າເລືອກເອົາ' (if selected) or 'ຖ້າເປີດໃຊ້' (if enabled) might be more accurate depending on the UI element.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າເລືອກເອົາ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'with authorization details' could be more precisely translated.  'ລາຍລະອຽດການອະນຸຍາດ' is accurate but a slight nuance in 'details' might be conveyed by 'ຂໍ້ມູນການເຂົ້າສິດ' (access information).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຂໍ້ມູນການເຂົ້າສິດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "authorization details" is not accurate. "Proces uwierzytelniania" translates to "authentication process" and doesn't convey the meaning of authorization details.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jeśli opcja jest zaznaczona, wszyscy nowi użytkownicy otrzymają zaproszenie ze szczegółami autoryzacji.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පිළිගැනීමේ ලිපිය' (piliganae lipeya) translates to 'acceptance letter' which is not quite the same as an 'invite letter'.  A more accurate translation for 'invite letter' would be 'අundangනාව' (undhanawa).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සබල කළහොත්, සියලුම නව පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට අවසර දීමේ විස්තර සහිත අundangනාව ලැබෙනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'yetkilendirme ayrıntılarını içeren bir davet mektubu alır' is a bit literal and sounds unnatural in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be 'yetkilendirme bilgilerini içeren bir davetiye alırlar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: yetkilendirme bilgilerini içeren bir davetiye alırlar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'İşaretlenirse' is correct, but a more consistent flow might be achieved by rephrasing the entire sentence to align better with standard Turkish sentence structure. This isn't a hard error, but improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Seçildiğinde, tüm yeni kullanıcılar yetkilendirme bilgilerini içeren bir davetiye alırlar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "invite letter" is inaccurate. "Thư chào mừng" translates to 'welcome letter', not 'invite letter'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu được chọn, tất cả người dùng mới sẽ nhận được thư mời với các chi tiết việc ủy quyền.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "các chi tiết việc ủy quyền" is awkward and not the most natural way to express "authorization details".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu được chọn, tất cả người dùng mới sẽ nhận được thư mời với các chi tiết ủy quyền.
